item.title: Real Time Error Checking and Code Completion With Neovim
item.description: I had written a few months ago on Medium that I was trying to switch from using VS Code as my main editor to Vim. As I mentioned in that post, I’ve used Vim for years now, but never as my “main” editor for when I need to get serious work done, such as with my job. I also swapped from vanilla Vim to Neovim, which I found to have a few quality of life improvements that I enjoyed.
